headline: Should Corning Be in Your Portfolio Post Strong Q4 Earnings?

headline: Trump announces $12bn critical mineral stockpile to reduce reliance on China
summary: The initiative combines $1.67bn in private investment with a $10bn loan from EXIM.

headline: Is Wall Street Bullish or Bearish on Corning Stock?
summary: Despite Corning's strong performance relative to the broader market over the past year, Wall Street analysts maintain a cautiously optimistic outlook on the stock’s prospects.

headline: Corning (GLW) Climbs 6.87% on Rare Earths Devt Support
summary: We recently published 10 Big Names Already Crushing This February. Corning Inc. (NYSE:GLW) was one of the top performers on Monday. Corning rallied for a second day on Monday, jumping 6.87 percent to close at $110.35 apiece, as investors bet on President Donald Trump’s $12 billion rare earths stockpile project as a huge catalyst for […]
